autoContrast.description: Determines whether text color with filled variant should depend on background-color. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast.
autoContrast.description_zh: 确定具有 filled 变体的文本颜色是否应取决于 background-color。如果 color 属性的亮度小于 theme.luminosityThreshold，则 theme.white 将用于文本颜色，否则使用 theme.black。覆盖 theme.autoContrast。

color.description: Key of theme.colors or any valid CSS color, default value is theme.primaryColor
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的 Key 或任何有效的 CSS 颜色，默认值为 theme.primaryColor

icon.description: Icon displayed next to the title

onClose.description: Called when the close button is clicked

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius, theme.defaultRadius by default
radius.description_zh: theme.radius 的键或任何用于设置 border-radius 的任何有效 CSS 值，默认为 theme.defaultRadius

withCloseButton.description: Determines whether close button should be displayed, false by default
withCloseButton.description_zh: 确定是否应显示关闭按钮，默认为 false
